markdownRemark.html:
Hi Friends üëã,

Welcome To SortoutCode! ‚ù§Ô∏è

To add the squared style of a button using BootstrapVue.We are going to use the b-button component to add the button in our project. To add the squared style of a button we are going to use squared props.

Today I am going to show you How you add the squared style of a button using BootstrapVue in VueJS?

Table of contains

  • Setup the Vue.js
  • Install the Bootstrap and BootstrapVue
  • Create FirstComponent.vue and import it into App.js
  • Add squared style of the button component

Let‚Äôs start today‚Äôs tutorial How do I add the squared style of a button using BootstrapVue in VueJS?

Setup the Vue.js

First, we have to install the Vue project, I had installed the vueJS in my system. If you haven‚Äôt installed or have any problem with installation you can follow this article, which will show you step by step process of installation.

How to Install the VueJS project?

Install the Bootstrap and BootstrapVue

First, we have to install the Vue project, I had installed the vueJS in my system. If you haven‚Äôt installed or have any problem with installation you can follow this article, which will show you step by step process of installation. In that article, I had also show you how to install BootstrapVue in your vue.js project step by step.

How to install or configure vue-bootstrap in VueJS?

Create FirstComponent.vue and import it into App.js

Create the new component in the src/components/ components folder. the component name is FirstComponent.vue and imported into the App.js file:

App.js

<template>
  <div id="app">
    <FirstComponent />
  </div>
</template>

<script>
import FirstComponent from "./components/FirstComponent.vue";
export default {
  name: "App",
  components: {
    FirstComponent,
  },
};
</script>

Add squared style of the button component

To add the button to our component we have to use the b-button component of BootstrapVue.Bootstrap‚Äôs v-button is for actions in forms, dialogs, and more.

To add the squared style of a button we are going to use squared props. Let‚Äôs see the code example:

FirstComponent.js

<template>
  <div>
    <b-button squared>Sortoutocde</b-button>
  </div>
</template>
<script>
export default { 
  name: "FirstComponent",
};
</script>

For now, let‚Äôs check the output.

All the best üëç.
